body_html: @robintibor if you want to use pytorch in the meanwhile, especially the latest version, i think you can simply install the CUDA 7.5 version of pytorch (pytorch packages all the libraries it needs, you dont need a system CUDA of a particular version). With your particular driver version, I think that would be sufficient and work.
